text:
Hello Everyone,
I have a json like this

```{
	"jobTitle": "BIM Modeler",
	"usersData": [
		{
			"userId": 18,
			"lastName": "Haokip",
			"firstName": "Jangkholun",
			"userProfileUrl": "<http://localhost:4000/profile?id=18>"
		}
	],
	"hpSpocName": "xyz",
	"internalPOC": "abc",
	"companyUserId": 20,
	"companyEmailId": "<mailto:abc@gmail.com|abc@gmail.com>"
}```
I want to run a for loop for usersData and access firstName of each user in Hubl.

My code is like this

```{% for user in custom.usersData %}
   <div>hi {{user.firstName}}</div>
{% endfor %}```
Somehow, this is not working.
Can someone help?
